snippet: Three corrections deputies were charged with murder on Tuesday in the beating of a mentally ill inmate at the Santa Clara County jail in San Jose, Calif.
abstract: San Jose, Calif, corrections deputies Matthew Farris, Jereh Lubrin and Rafael Rodriguez are charged with murder after allegedly beating mentally ill inmate Michael James Tyree to death at Santa Clara County jail.
lead_paragraph: Three corrections deputies were charged with murder on Tuesday in the beating of a mentally ill inmate at the Santa Clara County jail in San Jose, Calif.

headline.main: California: Deputies Charged in Prisoner’s Killing
headline.print_headline: California: Deputies Charged in Prisoner’s Killing
